data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Carolus Linnaeus (1758): gamma 91. In: Systema naturae per regna tria naturae, secundum classes, ordines, genera, species, cum characteribus, differentiis, synonymis, locis. Laurentii Salvii, Holmiae [= Stockholm].: 513, DOI: 10.5962/bhl.title.542
